blessing.name: Blessing of the Abyssal Moon: Frozen Wastes
blessing.description: When characters hit opponents with Normal or Charged Attacks, there is a 50% chance to unleash a Frigid Cascade at the opponent's location, dealing True DMG. Can be triggered once every 0.3s.

firstHalf.tips: Bring strong single-target DPS and AOE capabilities

secondHalf.tips: Geo or Anemo characters help with corrosion
Ranged characters or strong bow users

recommendedCharacters.name: Neuvillette
recommendedCharacters.reason: Exceptional hydro damage, excellent against most chambers. Strong sustain and AOE capabilities.

recommendedCharacters.name: Arlecchino
recommendedCharacters.reason: Top-tier pyro DPS with self-sustain. Excellent for current blessing and chamber layouts.

recommendedCharacters.name: Nahida
recommendedCharacters.reason: Core enabler for dendro teams. Essential for Hyperbloom and Spread compositions.

recommendedCharacters.name: Kazuha
recommendedCharacters.reason: Universal support with crowd control and elemental damage boost. Works in most team comps.

recommendedCharacters.name: Furina
recommendedCharacters.reason: Versatile support with massive damage boost. Pairs excellently with Neuvillette and most DPS.

recommendedCharacters.name: Raiden Shogun
recommendedCharacters.reason: Solid electro DPS and energy battery. Great for Hyperbloom and national teams.

recommendedCharacters.name: Xingqiu
recommendedCharacters.reason: Consistent hydro application and damage reduction. Core for many reaction teams.

recommendedCharacters.name: Bennett
recommendedCharacters.reason: Universal ATK buffer and healer. Essential for most pyro and physical teams.

recommendedCharacters.name: Fischl
recommendedCharacters.reason: Consistent off-field electro damage. Excellent for electrocharged and aggravate teams.

recommendedCharacters.name: Zhongli
recommendedCharacters.reason: Universal shielder with resistance shred. Makes chambers significantly easier.

recommendedCharacters.name: Kuki Shinobu
recommendedCharacters.reason: Best Hyperbloom trigger with healing. Strong in dendro reaction teams.

recommendedCharacters.name: Yelan
recommendedCharacters.reason: Alternative to Xingqiu with higher personal damage. Excellent hydro application.

recommendedCharacters.name: Xiangling
recommendedCharacters.reason: Strong off-field pyro damage. Core for national team variants.

recommendedCharacters.name: Sucrose
recommendedCharacters.reason: Budget alternative to Kazuha. Good EM sharing and crowd control.

recommendedCharacters.name: Mona
recommendedCharacters.reason: Omen buff for burst damage teams. Good hydro application.

recommendedTeams.name: Neuvillette Hypercarry
recommendedTeams.description: Top-tier team with exceptional damage and survivability. Furina amplifies Neuvillette's damage while Kazuha provides grouping and resistance shred. Zhongli ensures safety.

recommendedTeams.name: Arlecchino Vape
recommendedTeams.description: High damage vaporize team. Double hydro ensures consistent reactions while Bennett provides ATK buff and healing.

recommendedTeams.name: Hyperbloom Core
recommendedTeams.description: Powerful reaction-based team. Nahida enables dendro cores while Kuki triggers hyperbloom. Kazuha provides crowd control.

recommendedTeams.name: Raiden National
recommendedTeams.description: Classic strong team with consistent damage. Raiden solves energy issues while triggering powerful reactions.

recommendedTeams.name: Freeze Team
recommendedTeams.description: Alternative freeze comp leveraging Neuvillette's hydro application. Strong crowd control and sustained damage.
